column2: "Na Nyankopɔn see Jakob dɛ
column3: Soɛr
column5: na kɛtsena hɔ: na yɛ afɔrmbukyia wɔ hɔ ma Nyankopɔn a oyii noho kyerɛɛ wo wɔ aber a ifii wo nua Esau n'enyim guanee no."

column2: "Nna Jakob see ne fifo nye hɔn a wɔnye no wɔ hɔ nyinara dɛ
column3: Hom ntow enyame ananaben a ɔwɔ hom mu no ngu

column2: "na hom mma yɛnsoɛr
column3: na yɛnkɔ Bɛtɛl; na mebɛyɛ afɔrmbukyia wɔ hɔ ama Nyankopɔn a m'ahohia da no ɔgyee me do
column4: na odzii m'ekyir wɔ kwan a mutui no mu no."

column2: "Na wɔdze hɔn enyame ananaben a ɔwɔ hɔn nsamu nyinara
column3: nye nkaba a ɔhyehyɛ hɔn asomu no maa Jakob; na Jakob dze hyɛɛ esudur no a ɔwɔ Sekem ho no ase."

column2: "Na wɔkɔree: na ihu kɛsenara tɔɔ nkurow a wɔabɔ hɔn ho aprɔw no do
column3: ma woenntsiw Jakob ne mbabanyin no."

column2: "Na Jakob baa Luz a ɔwɔ Keenan asaase do no
column3: (ɔnoara nye Bɛtɛl)
column4: ɔno nye nkorɔfo a wɔka no ho nyinara."

column2: "Na osii afɔrmbukyia wɔ hɔ
column3: na ɔfrɛɛ bea no El-Bɛtɛl: osiandɛ hɔ na Nyankopɔn yii noho kyerɛɛ no wɔ aber a ofii no nua enyim guanee no."

column2: "Na Debora
column3: Rebeka no hwɛfo no wui
column5: wɔ esudur no ase: na wɔtoo ne dzin Allon-bakut a asekyerɛ nye Nyinsuwakyi bea."

column2: "Na aber a Jakob fi Paddan-aram bae no
column3: Nyankopɔn yii noho kyerɛɛ no bio

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn see no dɛ
column3: Wo dzin dze Jakob: wɔnnkɛfrɛ wo dzin Jakob bio
column4: na Israel bɛyɛ wo dzin: na ɔtoo ne dzin Israel."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn see no dɛ
column3: Emi nye Nyankopɔn Otumfo: wo mba na dɔr; ɔman nye amanaman asafo befi wo mu aba
column4: na ahemfo befi w'asen mu epue."

column2: "Asaase a medze memaa Abraham nye Isaak no
column3: ɔwo na medze mebɛma wo
column4: na w'asefo a wodzi w'ekyir no na medze asaase no bɛma hɔn."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn fii ne nkyɛn wɔ mbrɛ ɔnye no kasae no kɔr sor."
"Na Jakob sii idum wɔ mbrɛ ɔnye no kasae no; ɔbo dum a: na ohuee ɔnom afɔr guu do
column3: na ohuee ngo guu do."

column2: "Na Jakob frɛɛ bea no a Nyankopɔn nye no kasae wɔ hɔ no ne dzin Bɛtɛl."
"Na wofii Bɛtɛl sii mu; na aka ɔkwan kakra bi ma woedu Efrat no: awoo kaa Rahel
column3: na n'awoo no mu yɛɛ dzen."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a n'awoo no mu yɛɛ dzen no
column3: nna awogyefo no see no dɛ
column4: Mma nnsuro; ibenya babanyin kor so afei."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: ne kra rifi no mu no (osiandɛ owui)
column4: ɔtoo no dzin Ben-oni; na n'egya dze ɔfrɛɛ no Benjamin."

column2: "Na Rahel wui
column3: na wosiee no wɔ Efrat kwan mu

column2: "Na Jakob sii ne nda do idum: ɔnoara nye Rahel ne nda do idum dze bodu ndɛ da yi."
"Na Israel tui
column3: na ɔkɔbɔɔ n'asesee wɔ Eder abantsentsen ekyir noho."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: Israel tse asaase no do no
column4: nna Reuben kɔree na ɔnye n'egya n'abaawayer Bilha kɛdae: na Israel tsee. Afei Jakob ne mbabanyin yɛ duebien:"

column2: "Leah ne mba; Jakob n'abakan Reuben
column3: Simeon

column2: "Rahel ne mba; Josef nye Benjamin:"
"na Rahel n'abaawa Bilha ne mba; Dan nye Naftali:"
"na Leah n'abaawa Zilpa ne mba; Gad nye Aser. Woyinom nye Jakob ne mbabanyin a wɔwoo hɔn maa no wɔ Paddan-aram."
"Na Jakob baa n'egya Isaak nkyɛn wɔ Mamre
column3: wɔ Kiriat-arba (ɔnoara nye Hebron)
column4: mbrɛ Abraham nye Isaak bɛtsenae no."

column2: "Na Isaak ne nda yɛɛ mfe ɔha eduowɔtwe."
"Na Isaak gyaa no sunsum mu
column3: na owui
column4: na otsiiw ne nananom wɔ samanadze
column5: a nna ɔayɛ akɔdaa a oedzi mfe pii: na ne mba Esau nye Jakob siee no."
